CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 10, 1953, pg. 21 reads: "Ground-Breaking - Six clean new shovels turned the first earth for the 118 unit Belmar Gardens housing development. Participating are, left to right, Nicholas LeDonne, head of the construction firm; Mrs. William Brafman; William Brafman, sponsor, Congressman Robert J. Corbett; Mayor David L. Lawrence, Councilman Patrick T. Fagan and Mrs. R.L. Vann.  At the extreme right is David Fuss, administrative assistant to Senator James M. Duff."
TitMainTitle: Nicholas LeDonne, Mrs. Brafman, William Brafman, Congressman Robert J. Corbett, Mayor David L. Lawrence, Councilman Patrick T. Fagan, Jessie Vann, and David Fuss standing on site for Belmar Gardens groundbreaking ceremony
